Class PatientCtrl

java.lang.Object
userInfoControl.PatientCtrl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentCtrl, MedicalRecordCtrl
public class PatientCtrl extends Object implements MedicalRecordCtrl, AppointmentCtrl
PatientCtrl is responsible for managing patient-related operations, including viewing and updating medical records, scheduling appointments, and viewing available slots for doctors. It also interacts with various CSV operators to handle patient data, appointments, and medical records.

    Constructs a new PatientCtrl instance with the provided patient details.

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientCtrl

      public PatientCtrl(String hospitalID, String name, String gender, int age)
      Constructs a new PatientCtrl instance with the provided patient details. It reads all appointments for the given patient and categorizes them into appointments and completed outcome records.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique identifier for the patient in the hospital system.
      name - The name of the patient.
      gender - The gender of the patient.
      age - The age of the patient.

  • Method Details

    • showMedicalRecord

      public void showMedicalRecord()
      Displays the medical record of the patient, including personal details and past diagnoses and treatments.
      Specified by:
      showMedicalRecord in interface MedicalRecordCtrl

    • updateMedicalRecord

      public void updateMedicalRecord()
      Allows the user to update their medical record. The patient can modify their phone number or email address. After updating, changes are saved to the corresponding CSV file.
      Specified by:
      updateMedicalRecord in interface MedicalRecordCtrl

    • viewAvailableSlots

      public void viewAvailableSlots()
      Displays a list of available doctors and allows the user to view the available slots of a chosen doctor.
      Specified by:
      viewAvailableSlots in interface AppointmentCtrl

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment()
      Handles the scheduling of an appointment for the patient. The user selects a doctor, date, and time slot for the appointment. The system checks for availability and confirms the booking.
      Specified by:
      scheduleAppointment in interface AppointmentCtrl

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment()
      Reschedules an existing appointment by allowing the user to select a new date and time. Updates both the user's and the doctor's schedules, and modifies the CSV files accordingly. The user can cancel the rescheduling process at any time by entering -1.
      Specified by:
      rescheduleAppointment in interface AppointmentCtrl

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment()
      Cancels an existing appointment. The appointment is marked as "Canceled" in the system and the doctor's schedule is updated accordingly. The user can exit the cancellation process by entering -1.
      Specified by:
      cancelAppointment in interface AppointmentCtrl

    • viewScheduledAppointment

      public void viewScheduledAppointment()
      Displays a list of all scheduled appointments for the user, including details like the doctor's ID, appointment status, date, and time. If there are no scheduled appointments, it notifies the user.
      Specified by:
      viewScheduledAppointment in interface AppointmentCtrl

    • viewPastRecords

      public void viewPastRecords()
      Displays the user's past completed appointment records. Each record includes the appointment date, type of service, prescribed medications, and consultation notes. If there are no completed appointments, it notifies the user.
      Specified by:
      viewPastRecords in interface AppointmentCtrl
